title: HACKED ON QILVIN. THIS ACCOUNT. NEED HELP
body: Someone changed my password and email yet I am still on this account please Riot help me! the email is supposed to be cbrown2013@yahoo.com but this person somehow was able to hack into my email? or something and change it to a gmail account ******wzano@gmail.com can't see all the letters on this site of course but please this is horrible.

replies.body:
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 

Oh nooooo!!! We don't want anyone messing around with your account of course, so go ahead and hit up our account's team through our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). Be sure to work with them and answer as many of the questions to the best of your knowledge. Even if some of the answers end up being wrong the more information we have the easier it'll be to verify you!
